titleStmt.title: Achilles shield Translated as the other seuen bookes of Homer, out of his eighteenth booke of Iliades. By George Chapman Gent.
Iliad. Book 18. English. Chapman. Selections
titleStmt.author: Homer.
Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet, and are to be sold at Paules Wharfe, at the signe of the Crosse Keyes,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes bound with: Seaven bookes of the Iliades of Homere, prince of poets: London, 1598.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
